chapter.title: Installing OTRS::ITSM
chapter.para: OTRS framework version 2.2 or later must be installed prior to the installation of OTRS::ITSM. All necessary information, options and installation procedures are depicted in the OTRS Admin Manual.

warning.para: Installation of the OTRS::ITSM packages requires empty free-text fields 13-16 and free-time fields 3-6 in the complete system!
